sqlMap.select: select a.entry_code, a.entry_name, a.entry_type, b.item_key, b.item_value, b.item_order from jat_sys_dict_entry a, jat_sys_dict_item b where a.entry_code = b.entry_code and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 order by a.entry_type, a.entry_code, b.item_order, b.item_key
sqlMap.sql: entry_code, entry_name, entry_type, memo, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date, status
sqlMap.select: select from jat_sys_dict_entry a where a.entry_type = #entryType# and a.status = 1 order by a.entry_code, a.entry_name limit $start$, $limit$
select count(1) from jat_sys_dict_entry a where a.entry_type = #entryType# and a.status = 1
select from jat_sys_dict_entry a where a.entry_code = #entryCode# order by a.entry_code

select entry_code, item_key, item_value, item_order, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date, status from jat_sys_dict_item a where a.entry_code = #entryCode# and a.status = 1 order by a.item_order, a.item_key
sqlMap.insert: insert into jat_sys_dict_entry(entry_code,entry_name, entry_type, memo, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date, status) values(#entryCode#,#entryName#,#entryType#,#memo#,#createId#,#createDate#,#updateId#,#updateDate#,#status#)
sqlMap.update: update jat_sys_dict_entry a set a.entry_name = #entryName#, a.memo = #memo#, update_id = #updateId#, update_date = #updateDate#, status = #status# where a.entry_code = #entryCode#

update jat_sys_dict_item a set a.item_value = #itemValue#, a.item_order = #itemOrder#, a.update_id = #updateId#, a.update_date = #updateDate#, a.status = #status# where a.entry_code = #entryCode# and a.item_key = #itemKey# and a.status = 1
sqlMap.delete: delete from jat_sys_dict_item where entry_code = #value# and status = 0
